metadata.title: CVE-2023-29548 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A wrong lowering instruction in the ARM64 Ion compiler resulted in a wrongoptimization result. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 112, Focus forAndroid < 112, Firefox ESR < 102.10, Firefox for Android < 112, andThunderbird < 102.10.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
